biotools.summary: Platform-independent 1D and 2D gel analysis system that is freely available. Features include the ability to mark spots, to measure spot intensities and to archive gel images and annotations to the public database GelBank. Includes searchable access to GelBank's repository.

bioschemas.name: GelScape and GelBank
bioschemas.summary: Platform-independent 1D and 2D gel analysis system that is freely available. Features include the ability to mark spots, to measure spot intensities and to archive gel images and annotations to the public database GelBank. Includes searchable access to GelBank's repository.
